Uses of Interface
edu.cuny.cat.stat.ScoreDaysCondition

Packages that use ScoreDaysCondition
edu.cuny.cat.stat   
 

Uses of ScoreDaysCondition in edu.cuny.cat.stat
 

Classes in edu.cuny.cat.stat that implement ScoreDaysCondition
 class AbstractScoreDaysCondition
           An abstract ScoreDaysCondition which makes decision once for each queries day.
 class AllScoreDaysCondition
          A ScoreDaysCondition defines that all game days are counted for scoring.
 class CombiScoreDaysCondition
          A ScoreDaysCondition that is based on the rules in a set of sub- ScoreDaysConditions.
 class DefaultScoreDaysCondition
          A ScoreDaysCondition with which game days after a certain point are counted with a certain probability for scoring.
 class DistributionBasedScoreDaysCondition
           A ScoreDaysCondition defines that game days are chosen for scoring with probabilities according to the cumulative distribution function of a certain distribution.
 class RangeBasedScoreDaysCondition
          A ScoreDaysCondition with which game days falling into a certain frame are all counted for scoring.
 

Methods in edu.cuny.cat.stat that return ScoreDaysCondition
 ScoreDaysCondition ScoreReport.getScoreDaysCondition()
           
 

Methods in edu.cuny.cat.stat that return types with arguments of type ScoreDaysCondition

Methods in edu.cuny.cat.stat with parameters of type ScoreDaysCondition
 void CombiScoreDaysCondition.addCondition(ScoreDaysCondition condition)
          Add a new ScoreDaysCondition
